Common Floor Contra Dance

June 12, 2022

Topsham Grange Hall (47 Pleasant St, Topsham, Maine)
Calling by:
  • Ellen Hodgkin
  • Hannah Chamberlain
Music by:
  • Ellen Gawler on fiddle
  • Elsie Gawler on fiddle - (tentative)
  • Ben Foss on guitar
Beginner lesson at 7pm
Dance from 7:30 to 10pm
$10 to $20 sliding scale (cash or venmo)
Bring a water bottle and clean shoes to dance in
Did you know you'll need to wear a mask? Do you know what type? Read through our policies!

You can help!

  • Volunteer

  • Print this beautiful flyer (below) that Ellen Hodgkin made
Future dances will be on July 10th and August 28th.

For questions or to sign up for future dance reminders, email CommonFloorContraDance@gmail.com
